The pure class interface. 
public abstract class AnnotatedTerm
  extends Term
The abstract class AnnotatedTerm is the superclass of any term of which carries an annotation. An annotated term agregates an instance of class Annotation.

Version: $Id: AnnotatedTerm.pizza,v 1.2 2000/03/13 06:57:11 wg Exp $
